EmployeeDemographicSum.name: EmployeeDemographicSum
EmployeeDemographicSum.description: Represents statistics about employees based on their demographic information, such as employee count by age group, by gender, and by region.

AgeGroup.description: Specifies the age group of an employee.

Country.description: Specifies the country for which the demographic information is added.

Description.description: The description of the employee statistics.

DisclsReportingPeriodId.description: The reporting period for which the employee statistics are generated.

EmployeeCount.description: The total number of employees based on a combination of employment type, work type, gender, age group, and region.

Gender.description: Specifies the gender of an employee.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Month.description: Specifies the month for which the demographic information is added.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Percentage.description: The percentage of employees based on a combination of employment type, work type, gender, age group, and region.

Region.description: Specifies the region of an employee.

ReportType.description: Specifies the type of report that uses the employee statistics.

SubsidiaryAccountId.description: The account that's identified as a subsidiary company.

WorkType.description: Specifies the type of work done by the employee.
